data.convo: How far do we have to go ? About 50 miles . The traffic is not very heavy on this high way , is it ? So I ’ m sure we ’ ll make it . No , but we ’ Ve got a hurry . It will be the rush hour soon . Don ’ t worry . There ’ s plenty of time yet . But it ’ s Friday today . This road is always jam packed during the weekend , isn ’ t it ? Right .
